array.name: man
array.item: zz is a very unique and interseting person. He has big dream and he can make them come true. A very awesome person who is well rounded and good at everything. He only thinks about the lucky girl he loves and not anyone else. zz has a kind heart and is family-oriented.He\'s adorable and hot.He has everything a girl craving for.

zz is very unique and interesting person. Will insist that he is a piece of hard candy, but if you dig deep enough, he\'s got a soft chewy center. A handsome man with a perfect smile. The epitome of cool. Often used to denote someone who\'s very understanding. zz is a great listener and you can always trust him for anything. If you are his girl, hell take care of you like a litte princess.

zz is a very unique and interesting person. He is fun and playful but has a serious side.He falls in love very quickly and sticked with one girl if he likes her. He only thinks about the lucky girl he loves and not for anyone else. zz has a kind heart and is family-oriented.Girl really wish a guy like him because he has got most of skills.

Strong opinions but has an open mind. Will insist that he\'s got a softy chewy center.A handsome man with a perfect smile. Will do anything for friends. zz is a great listener and you can always trust him for anything. Girl really wish to have a man who is protective enough ans secure enough.

zz is an achiever and the best person you turn to when you want to cry on the shoulder. Destined to become a person who does not have an average job. The kind of person who is one in a million. A perfect blend of brain and strength.zz is a great listener and you can aways trust him for anything.If you are his girl, he\'ll take care of you like a little princess.

A smart, talented and humurous guy, who likes to take charge. He is dutiful and will never put his own thoughts and feeling before his loved ones. zz likes to keep his friend-circle tight and small. He is picky about who trusts in him and isn\'t fond of large circles. Will do anything for friends. Keep him in your life when he comes across you. You might regret leaving him. Girls really wish to have a man who is protectve enough and secure enough.

If you ever find zz just hold him tightly in your life and never let him go because he is a gem. He is a great person who will be the best friend you ever had once you crack his hard outer shell. zz likes to keep his friend-circle tight and small. He is picky about who trusts in him and isn\'t fond of large circles. He only thinks about the lucky girl he loves and not for anyone else. One of the most wonderful person you will ever meet in your life. Wise enough to overcome every situation.

Many people find zz rude and arrogant but he is the best and thus has many enemies. He is a great person who will be the best friend you ever had once you crack his hard outer shell. A very awesome person who is well rounded and good at everything. The epitome of cool. Often used to denote someone who\'s very understanding. The person who radiates happiness. Girls really wish a guy like him because he has got most of the skills.

zz is a guy who is not really insecure and is quite protective sometimes. zz is a fun energetic guy. He has a compelling personality zz likes to keep his friend-circle tight and small. He is picky about who trusts in him and isn\'t fond of large circles. A handsome, charming man and full of joy. He makes you smile from the depth of his heart. You love him and never want to lose him. He\'s adorable and hot. He has everything a girl craving for.

He is good looking, polite and just all-round plain awesome. Destined to become a person who does not have an average job. zz likes to keep his friend-circle tight and small. He is picky about who trusts in him and isn\'t fond of large circles. A handsome, charming man and full of joy. The person who radiates happiness. One of the sweetest guy you will ever come across.

array.name: woman
array.item: zz can\'t be wholly defined in a few words because she\'s so close to perfection that any words for her just won\'t be good enough. She\'s the girl that will change the world. She is a kind and caring person. You are really lucky if you have an zz. Stunning long legs, hazel eyes, perfect smile, dimples, freckles and every guy\'s dream. The most perfect girl in the universe

zz has a lot of talent in the arts and performance arts. She has quite a lot of sports potential that she may or may not put in to use. zz has an elegance, charm and good taste, is naturally kind, very gentle and a lover of beauty. They are logical, understandable and see through any trick or gig you try to pull on them. zz is the best kind of person that you will ever meet. Her smile is infectious and she laughs all the time which everyone loves about her.

One of the most unique girl you\'ll ever meet. zz has an elegance, charm and good taste, is naturally kind, very gentle and a lover of beauty. They usually have trouble expressing their emotions in real life, but it takes the right person to see through this barrier and into their true hearts. Keep her in your life when she comes across you. You might regret leaving her. Sometimes she may feel like she doesn\'t fit with anyone or no one likes her but she is very popular.

zz is the definition of compassion. She\'s the girl that will change the world. Quiet with the ones she is unfamiliar with and ecstatic with those she prizes. zz is funny and she will make you laugh in the hardest times because she loves to see people smile. The person who radiates happiness.

zz is a graceful and sophisticated, yet simple charm and is naturally beautiful. The queen of real goon nation and one of a kind. Never less than awesome. zz is extremely caring, affable and she is very sensitive but tends to hide it. She is very funny, smart and good even at the new things she tries. zz doesn\'t know how valuable she really is, so let her know her worthiness.

zz is a great listener and you can always trust her with anything. Always will have your back no matter who you are unless you get on her bad side. Once you get on the bad side of her, you have no way of coming back. She\'s beautiful, lovely body and a lovely personality. zz is worthy of being a friend for quite a long time. A beautiful girl who makes people laugh all the time.

zz might come off as indifferent and impatient occasionally but it\'s only because they are working for the greater good which takes a lot of effort. She\'s smart, beautiful, kind and caring. She\'s beautiful, lovely body and a lovely personality. Sometimes you need to have patience with her because she has anger issues. But she will get over it very fast. A beautiful girl who makes people laugh all the time.

zz can do whatever she puts her mind to and she is not a quitter. She does not give up easily on anything or on anyone. Hard exterior but if you go through the tunnel, you\'ll find a sweet, sensitive and wonderful soul. zz is cute and caring. One of the nicest person you\'ll ever meet. She cares about her family and friends and is a person who is trustworthy. zz runs the world and always gets what she desires.

She\'s the kind of girl who\'s so loveable that everyone likes her. She loves music. You\'ll fall in love as soon as you meet, but be careful because if you break her heart, she\'ll not easily forgive you. Keep her in your life when she comes across you. You might regret leaving her. Her smile is infectious and she laughs all the time which everyone loves about her.
